body_text: How does Hiyori figure out Yato's real name? Hiyori manages to save Yato from the underworld by discovering that his true name was Yaboku. How did she come to this conclusion?

How did Hiyori realize Yato's real name in Noragami Aragoto? I watched the anime and I didn't really realize how Hiyori suddenly realized what Yato's real name was when she was trying to call him from the underworld. I thought I had missed something in the story. I read the corresponding manga chapter and failed to understand the reason.
There was a flashback of Yato's shrine with his name on it thought. I think it might have something to do with how the name can be read in japanese. Can someone explain the reason?
And no spoilers please if that can be helped.
